attributes.action: please look at exhibition facilities for artists - encourage a more rigorous system of arts display and check out Warrington's Pyramid Centre's waiting list.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My local council, funded by the EU has built a brilliant new arts centre in Warrignton but two of the North West's most famous local artists have had to wait on a list to carry out an exhibition of their work for over 3 years - the petitioner is calling on the P.M. to explain what is the point of community project investments like this if local people don't benefit ?

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
